front.title: A Basic Interactive Voice Response (IVR) Control Package for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This document defines a Session Initiation (SIP) Control Package for basic Interactive Voice Response (IVR) interaction. The control of Media Servers and their related resources in decomposed network architectures plays an important role in various Next Generation Networks. This Control Package provides IVR functionality using the SIP Control Framework.
